{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Planex |model=MZK-MR150 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/02/2011 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=E-TOP |manuf_model=BR081n |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U6A-BR081N |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196C |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188RE |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=portable,3G capable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.111.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://www.planex.co.jp/product/router/mzk-mr150/ Product page]
[http://royalwin.blog.so-net.ne.jp/2012-06-30-3 Internals at royalwin.blog.so-net.ne.jp] :4MB Flash, 16MB RAM?
[http://wifi0.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-27.html Additional info and picture]
"EPMBBR081NXXX4XX" is silkscreened on the board.
Possible default SSIDs of '''ap-pc-XXXXXX''' and '''ap-game-XXXXXX'''. Default WPA key of 12345678? ([http://www.planex.co.jp/support/download/router/mzk-mr150/pdf/MZK-MR150_Manual_V1.1.pdf Manual])
==Images== <gallery caption="from Planex"> File:Mzk-mr150.jpg|angled </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]] <gallery caption="mirrored from above royalwin.blog.so-net.ne.jp link"> File:MZK-MR150 1.jpg|board File:MZK-MR150 2.jpg|casing </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]] <gallery caption="mirrored from above wifi0.blog.fc2.com link"> File:MZK-MR150 3.jpg|connected via serial </gallery> <gallery caption="internals from a CNet CQR-981"> File:CNet CQR-981 board top.jpg|board top File:CNet CQR-981 board bot.jpg|board bottom </gallery>
